snippet.title: Canberra Hospital escapee arrested across the border
snippet.content: Police have arrested a 23-year-old man who escaped from on Saturday night. Jonathon Hogan was in custody for charges related to property offences and resisting police.Photo: Supplied He had been taken to hospital after a court appearance and was last seen about 8.30pm on Saturday. He was arrested by NSW Police in the farming town of Boorowa on Tuesday afternoon, about 110 kilometres north of Canberra. ACT Policing thanked NSW Police for their assistance as well as members of the public who reported sightings of Hogan.
